seed_pair.target: They told us that they didn't want to explain.
seed_pair.known: Nos dijeron que no querían explicar.

seed_pair.target: They wanted to ask for help.
We don't know what they're trying to achieve.
seed_pair.known: No sabemos qué están intentando lograr.

seed_pair.target: Did you have a good time at the weekend?
seed_pair.known: ¿Pasaste un buen tiempo el fin de semana?

seed_pair.target: I went out on Saturday night.
seed_pair.known: Salí el sábado por la noche.

seed_pair.target: I had a glass or two of water.
seed_pair.known: Tuve un vaso o dos de agua.

seed_pair.target: I didn't do much on Sunday.
It was nice to relax for a while.
seed_pair.known: Fue agradable relajarse por un rato.

seed_pair.target: Did you watch a bit of television?
